tool_description: Generates specific design alternatives and technical solutions for addressing identified accessibility gaps within budget and space constraints.

gap_type.description: Type of accessibility gap to solve (entrance, doorway, restroom, elevator, parking, pathway, signage, emergency_egress)

available_space.description: Available space dimensions in feet [length, width, height]

budget_constraint.description: Maximum budget available for this specific solution

building_constraints.description: Structural or regulatory constraints (historic_building, load_bearing_walls, zoning_restrictions, utility_conflicts)

user_requirements.description: Specific user needs to address (wheelchair_access, visual_impairment, hearing_impairment, mobility_assistance, cognitive_support)

error_messages: Invalid gap type: Must be one of entrance, doorway, restroom, elevator, parking, pathway, signage, emergency_egress
Invalid available space: Must provide exactly 3 positive dimensions in feet
Invalid budget constraint: Must be a positive number greater than 0
Invalid building constraints: Must specify recognized constraint types if provided
Invalid user requirements: Must specify recognized accessibility user needs
usage: Specify the accessibility gap type, available space, budget, and user requirements. Optionally include building constraints. The tool will generate feasible design alternatives.

solution_id.description: Unique identifier for this design solution set

alternative_solutions.description: Alternative design options if primary solution is not feasible

estimated_cost.description: Estimated cost for the recommended solution

compliance_standards_met.description: List of accessibility standards the solution will satisfy
